author: Kia Kokalitcheva
title: The crypto industry's latest milestone: its own corporate VCs
description: Earlier this month OpenSea became the latest to debut a VC arm.
content:
Earlier this month, NFT marketplace OpenSea became the latest big crypto company to set up a venture arm.
